name: Space Coins
description:
An entry for the Jam for All BASIC DIALECTS #1

Written and compiled for Free BASIC. My idea was to make completly compatible with the original QBASIC 4.1 but I didn't have time because of my day job.

I compiled with the parameter -lang qb. There is also some '#IFDEF FORDOSQBASIC' but it is part of incomplete work, it will not work using it.

Hope you like some of it.
